Name: commonName
ValidationRules: Human-readable; not used as DNS name

Name: basicConstraints
ValidationRules: MUST be present and critical for WebPKI root

Name: keyUsage
ValidationRules: DigitalSignature and keyEncipherment SHOULD be unset for offline root

Name: subjectKeyIdentifier
ValidationRules: MUST be present to support path building

Name: nameConstraints
ValidationRules: Critical if present; strongly recommended for technically constrained sub-CAs only

Name: id-ecPublicKey
ValidationRules: Curve per BR and root program requirements

Name: id-ml-dsa-65
ValidationRules: Likely introduced via cross-signed classical intermediate
